mapr.user

Class UserCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapr.user.UserCoordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UserCoordinator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Runnable entry point for user command-line interface for DFS and MapReduce.
    Author:
    Derek Tzeng
